channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [JCRVLT-578] disabling jackrabbit-docviewparser throws NoSuchElementException
item.description:
Since some other validators are depending on the docviewparser an exception is thrown in case it is disabled.

 

[ERROR] Failed to execute goal org.apache.jackrabbit:filevault-package-maven-plugin:1.2.2:validate-files (default-validate-files) on project ui.apps: Execution default-validate-files of goal org.apache.jackrabbit:filevault-package-maven-plugin:1.2.2:validate-files failed.: NoSuchElementException -> [Help 1]

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
